pageProduct.name: QV Face Ultra Calming Moisturiser 75G
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Gentle enough to use every day, QV Face Ultra Calming Moisturiser is a 24 hour hydrating moisturiser which contains Avemide 15™, an Oat Kernel Extract, that helps reduce discomfort and helps calm and soothe the skin.

Warnings

CAUTION:
For external use only.  If irritation occurs, wash affected area and discontinue use.  Store below 30°C.
Always read the label and use only as directed. 
If symptoms persist see a healthcare professional.

Common Uses

• Contains Vitamin E & Avemide15 – to reduce discomfort of sensitive skin irritation symptoms
• A non- greasy and lightweight formula suitable to use everyday alone, or under makeup
• Specially formulated for the sensitive skin of the face & neck
• A rich combination of ingredients to moisturise and provide 24hr hydration to the skin
• Low-irritant formulation, fragrance, lanolin, propylene glycol and colour free
• Non-comedogenic, so it won’t block pores
• Dermatologically Tested

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Paraffinum Liquidum, Glycerin, Cyclopentasiloxane (and) Cyclohexasiloxane, Disodium Lauriminodipropionate Tocopheryl Phosphates, Cetearyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Myristate, Ceteareth-20, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Olivate (and) Sorbitan Olivate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Sodium PCA, Xanthan Gum, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Citric Acid, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil

Directions

Apply to the face and neck after cleansing.  Use in conjunction with QV Face Gentle Foaming Cleanser for a gentle way to cleanse and moisturise the skin.
